main event: A witness observed an unidentified light in the sky that made erratic zigzag movements for 3 minutes before disappearing.
interesting points: The object was traveling at an altitude of 300 to 500 feet and a speed of around 500 miles per hour.
The object was round in shape, silver in color, and seemed to wobble and turn as it traveled.
The object was visible for about 4 to 5 minutes before disappearing behind some trees.
The witness also reported seeing a reddish orange light traveling to the north at a fast speed.
The sighting occurred on multiple occasions, with the witness seeing the object again at 9:45.
sighted object: a round, silver object and a reddish orange light
